title: Side Effects of the Mayor of Flint (with Karen Weaver)
description:
This week, we talk to former Flint, Michigan mayor and current candidate Karen Weaver on her previous time in office, the water crisis, and the future of Flint.
And make sure to check out the documentary FLINT: Who Can You Trust?, in select theaters now, and digitally on May 12th: www.flintdocumentary.com
~
For more content, subscribe to our Patreon (patreon.com/smartfunnyandblack)!
~
Take a real Spring break and book yourself a moment of smooth at European Wax Center. Make a reservation today—your first wax is free.
To score 15% off your Blenders purchase, visit BLENDERS EYEWEAR dot com and enter promo code dosesvip. That’s BLENDERS EYEWEAR dot com, code dosesvip for 15% off. Blenders—Rocked with pride, worldwide.
